Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: The news today was mixed. On one side people rallied against proposed changes to the Pharmaceutical Benefits Scheme saying it that could harm Australians. Elsewhere the Queensland state became the first to appoint an autistic leader paving way for inclusive learning and support for people of all abilities. Evening news was dominated by the death of legendary comedian Barry Humphries whose wit and humor left a mark on Australia for seven decades.
